full_summary:
## LABORATORY MIXER MILL TENDER ANNOUNCEMENT

**Tender Title:** Laboratory Mixer Mill

**Reference Number:** cb-8161-63274123

**Amendment Number:** 1

**Solicitation Number:** 01R11-24-C035

**Publication Date:** August 15, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** September 24, 2023, 12:00:00 PM

**Amendment Date:** September 24, 2023

**Expected Contract Start Date:** September 11, 2023

**Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024

**Tender Status:** Expired

This tender announcement is for the purchase of a Laboratory Mixer Mill, which will be handled exclusively by the holders of Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI. This arrangement is held by suppliers who have pre-qualified on the Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies arrangement with Public Works and Government Services Canada. The mandatory technical criteria for this tender are as follows:

* The supplier must hold a valid Supply Arrangement with Public Works and Government Services Canada.
* The supplier must meet the mandatory technical criteria with the lowest aggregate price.

The supplier who meets the above requirements and has the lowest aggregate price will be recommended for contract award for the supply and delivery of a Laboratory Mixer Mill. The equipment will be installed at the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada's Swift Current Research and Development Centre.

Further information regarding the bid process and tender requirements can be obtained by downloading solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI /C from Buyandsell.gc.ca. Bidders must be registered on the arrangement and meet the mandatory technical criteria to be considered for the contract award.

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Camille Sobczak
* Email: camille.sobczak@agr.gc.ca
* Phone: (204) 430-5426
* Location: 400-303 Main Street, Winnipeg, Manitoba, R3C 3G7, Canada

This tender announcement is open to Canadian suppliers who are interested in partnering with Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada on this procurement. The closing date of the tender is September 24, 2023, 12:00:00 PM, and interested suppliers are encouraged to submit their bids on time. Any bids received after the closing date will be rejected.

**Trade Agreements:**
